scripts.dev: npm run database && next dev --turbopack && npm run database:down
scripts.launch: npm run database && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.launch:test: npm run database:test && npm run build && npm run start && npm run database:down
scripts.lint-format: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.pre-commit: npm run test && npm run lint-format
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run database:test && npm run build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'npx playwright test' && npm run database:down
scripts.database:dev: npm run database && prisma migrate dev && npm run database:down
scripts.database:test: docker compose -f compose-test.yml up -d && npm run database:create
scripts.database:studio: npm run database && npx prisma studio && npm run database:down
